name: collections::vec_deque::VecDeque::<T, A>::wrap_add

core::num::<impl usize>::wrapping_add.doc:
Wrapping (modular) addition. Computes `self + rhs`,
 wrapping around at the boundary of the type.

collections::vec_deque::wrap_index.doc: Returns the index in the underlying buffer for a given logical element index.

doc:
Returns the index in the underlying buffer for a given logical element
 index + addend.
